GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.42
GSD.description:
interconnect: qcom: bcm-voter: add a missing of_node_put()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.42 by commit 4e3cea8035b6f1b9055e69cc6ebf9fa4e50763ae, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 976daac4a1c581e5d5fd64047519fd6fcde39738. For more details please see the references link.
